tips.tip:
You may turn off the line numbers in the editor in menu:
Tools > Settings > Editor > Show Line Numbers.
You can move DTD diagram on screen by holding the left mouse button.
You can view the DTD diagram on Diagram design view.

You can evaluate XPath expression by using

XML > Evaluate XPath...
Right click one the diagram element will expand a context menu...

You may configure new File associations in:
Tools > Settings > File Associations
You can use Source Assistant during creation of DTD
You can Drag-n-Drop nodes in the Document Outliner. Source Assistant will automaticaly check the ability to move the node against the underlying DTD.
Attribute list maintained according the underlying DTD schema attributes.
You can copy the node by right-click and choose Duplicate from the context menu.

You may turn off the popup tips in the editor in menu:
Tools > Settings > Editor > Show popup tips

For predefined attributes the value can be choosed from the drop-down list.
...
<!ATTLIST Success
fromBusinessState CDATA #REQUIRED
fromBusinessStateIDRef IDREF #IMPLIED
conditionGuard (Success | BusinessFailure | TechnicalFailure | AnyFailure) #IMPLIED
For open the file by URL, XMLpad using the proxy settings for MS Internet Explorer.
When you create new XML node in the Document Outliner bu using Source Assistant menu-Append it will automatically create all the mandatory childs and attricutes.
For refresh the DTD schema just press F5.
